alert.note: Alert for Calvert; St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 4:46PM EDT until September 09 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central St. Marys County in southern Maryland... Central Calvert County in southern Maryland... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 446 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sheridan Point, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Prince Frederick, Saint Leonard Creek, Sheridan Point, Flag Harbor, Golden Beach, Saint Leonard, Huntingtown, Long Beach, Calvert Beach, Barstow, Port Republic, Sandgates, and Dares Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
